comments.author: Steve
comments.body:
I almost forgot the Frenzy address this morning! iSean really threw me for a loop too with an office-tangling cat's cradle:

![](http://www.flagstafffrenzy.org/wp-content/uploads/2009/04/photo1.jpg)

Good show, guys! Thanks!!! Here's an [album with cat's cradle pix](http://www.flagstafffrenzy.org/gallery/main.php?g2_itemId=1221).

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Good work, iSean! FYI, I don't personally have a birthday, 'case it matters. DU

comments.author: Greg
comments.body: Count me in for the birthday ride. I do have a conference call that might take me a bit past noon so I'll give y'all a heads-up if I'm running late.

comments.author: Mark Knowles
comments.body: Happy Birthday, Steve, My 83-year old mother, Tootie, whose birthday is also today, will be happy to know that there is a brithday twin out there who is keeping up with her. By the way, in the 50's, she was the only woman her age who rode her bike over the hills of the western Iowa town where I grew up, a fact that humbles me and makes me proud all at once!

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: Mark, Thanks so much! Please wish Tootie a Happy Birthday from her b-day twin! We look forward to seeing both of you on upcoming rides.
